flashcards.english: Wĩmwega Karanja (are you fine Karanja), Ndĩmwega Njeri (I am fine Njeri), Ũhoro waku Mwangi (how are you Mwangi/your news Mwangi), Nĩ mwega mũno (it is very good), Nĩ ndakũgeithia (greetings to you singular/I greet you), Nĩ ndageithĩka (I have received greetings), Nĩ ndamũgeithia (greetings you all/I greet you all), Nĩ twageithĩka (we have received greetings), Mũrĩega? (are you all fine?), Tĩ tũrĩega mũno (yes, we are very fine)
flashcards.notes: Extended week 2 greeting patterns showing singular/plural distinction. Pattern: ndakũgeithia (I greet you-singular) vs ndamũgeithia (I greet you-plural). Response: ndageithĩka (I have received) vs twageithĩka (we have received)
